text:
@realDonaldTrump 85,333 Americans are dead of covid-19 as of today 5/14

83,505  were dead 5/13

81,795 were dead 5/12

On avg, 2000 Americans STILL dying DAILY 

10,119 Americans died from May 5th to May 10th alone

By comparison, 12,469 Americans died from the 2009 swine flu over one full year
